quotes.quote: The world is not a rational place.
A rational process is a moral process.
If you want to feel good, be rational.
Only the rational and useful is beautiful.
In the end, rational policy is always good.
Rationalization is foreplay with one's conscience.
No crime can ever be defended on rational grounds.
In everything one thing is impossible: rationality.
Rationality is not one of this industry's attributes.
The real is the rational and the rational is the real.
If you scare somebody enough, they stop being rational.
A man has free choice to the extent that he is rational.
What is rational is actual and what is actual is rational.
A person is an individual substance of a rational nature.
Rational thinking which is free from assumptions ends therefore in mysticism.

Rational thinking is an important aspect of human nature, but we have imagination, we have ambition, we have irrational fear, we are swayed by other people, we get indoctrinated and we get influenced by advertising.
People who lean on logic and philosophy and rational exposition end by starving the best part of the mind.
Man is not a rational animal, he is a rationalizing animal.
The man of regular life and rational mind never despairs.
A rational prediction has an explanation based on theory.
Rational assessments too often led to rational surrenders.
Rational argument can be defeated by refusing to argue rationally.
In rational worlds all the hierarchies of our world are reversed.
These are not free men in any rational and exact sense of the word.
Rational confidence [is] the just result of knowledge and experience.
Rational thoughts never drive people's creativity the way emotions do.
It is rational to believe, as it is our very existence that is at stake.
If you're rational you don't get to believe whatever you want to believe.
When the rational mind is shut off, we have the possibility of intuition.
Rational beliefs bring us closer to getting good results in the real world.
